email_sequence.subject: Quick question about Global Allies, LLC's trade show process
email_sequence.body:
Hi Isaac,

Noticed Global Allies, LLC doesn't have mobile catalog access. When we see this, it usually means:

- Trade show orders written on paper, entered later
- Reps can't quote without calling the office
- Show leads lost to slow follow-up

Sound familiar? Or have you found workarounds?

email_sequence.subject: How Pebl Furniture eliminated your exact problem
email_sequence.body:
Hey Isaac,

Pebl Furniture had Global Allies, LLC's exact problem:

"Manual catalog navigation killing productivity"

Their transformation:
• Order time: 4 hours → 15 minutes
• Error rate: 30% → <1%
• Eliminated 3 hours daily per rep waste
• 47-day payback period

Proven across $2.3M customer portfolio.

Want their implementation playbook?

Best,
[Your Name]

email_sequence.subject: 3 companies solved Global Allies, LLC's exact challenges
email_sequence.body:
Hey Isaac,

3 companies solved Global Allies, LLC's challenges:

• Butler Specialty: 300% rep productivity increase
• Godinger Silver: "Best thing in 25 years"
• Wildwood Lamps: 33% fewer support calls

All report 25-40% productivity increases within 90 days.

12-minute video showing their results?

Best,
[Your Name]

email_sequence.subject: $750,000 impact for Global Allies, LLC

Hey Isaac,

Global Allies, LLC's current inefficiencies:

• Productivity loss: $300,000/year

• Total impact: $750,000/year

Investment: $20K/year
Payback: 47 days (validated across 15 customers)

Want your custom ROI model? Takes 15 minutes.

Best,
[Your Name]
